entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain at times heavy after midnight. Snowfall amount 20 to 30 cm. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 near the coast. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
